Default.SignInText: Access your favorite Microsoft products and services with just one account. Your Microsoft account connects you to the files, photos, people, and content you care about most.
Default.L2BackupSubTitle: Back up your files, apps, preferences to restore them across devices
Default.L2OtherUserSubTitle: Device access, work or school users, kiosk assigned access
Default.L2FamilySubTitle: Manage your family group, edit account types and device permissions
Default.L2EmailSubTitle: Accounts used by email, calendar, and contacts
Default.L2SignInSubTitle: Windows Hello, security key, password, dynamic lock
Default.L2WorkSchoolSubTitle: Organization resources like email, apps, and network
Default.SubscriptionDescription: Premium Office apps, OneDrive cloud storage, and more
Default.SubscriptionBody: One convenient subscription to share with up to five people in your family. Includes premium productivity apps, up to {{totalMemory}} of cloud storage – {{perPersonMemory}} per person – and advanced security for all your devices.
Default.BillingSubtitle: Get support for subscriptions, payments, and billing
Default.OneDriveBodyError: Your subscription includes {{storageTotal}} of OneDrive cloud storage
Default.PrivacySubtitle: View your privacy dashboard and manage activity data
Default.RewardsSubtitle: Earn and redeem points for using your favorite services and more
Default.PaymentSubtitle: Manage how you pay for purchases with your Microsoft account
Default.HistorySubtitle: View recent purchases made with your Microsoft account
Default.SubscriptionsSubtitle: Manage services and subscriptions from Microsoft
Default.UpsellDescription: One convenient subscription to share with up to five others. Includes premium Office apps and up to {{totalBytes}} of cloud storage ({{bytesPerPerson}} per person).
Default.PerpetualsBody: To view product details or install Office, visit your Microsoft account dashboard.
Default.InfoBarMessage: Your credit card expires soon. Update your payment info to keep your subscription.
